de.name: Eisbrecher
de.description: Diese Fragen sollen dabei helfen, ein Gespräch in Gang zu bringen und die Kommunikation zu erleichtern.
questions: Was sind deine Pläne für morgen?
Was war das Beste, das heute passiert ist?
Was war das Schlimmste, das heute passiert ist?
Was war dein Lieblingsfach in der Schule?
Was war dein Lieblingshobby als Kind?
Wer war dein bester Freund, als du jung warst?
Wer war dein größter Einfluss in deinem Leben?
Was ist das Wichtigste, was du je gelernt hast?
Was ist das Bedeutendste, was du je getan hast?
Was würdest du gerne noch tun, bevor du stirbst?
Was würdest du gerne ändern, wenn du die Möglichkeit hättest, dein Leben noch einmal zu leben?
Was ist dein größter Wunsch für mich?

en.name: Icebreaker
en.description: These questions are designed to help start a conversation and facilitate communication.
questions: What are your plans for tomorrow?
What was the best thing that happened today?
What was the worst thing that happened today?
What is your favorite vacation spot?
What was your favorite hobby as a child?
What was your most beautiful experience?
What was your most exciting experience?
What was your most embarrassing experience?
Who was your best friend when you were young?
Who was the biggest influence in your life?
What is the most important thing you ever learned?
What is the most significant thing you have ever done?
What would you like to do before you die?
If you had the opportunity to live your life again, what would you change?
What is your greatest wish for me?
